fields.name: DisplayTxtNoOSA
fields.fieldText:
There isn't an Off Site Agreement or ON Site Agreement attached to this Work Order.


Press Finish to return to the Work Order

fields.name: DisplayTxtSelectEmailsToSend
fields.fieldText:
Please use the check boxes below to select which Off Site Agreement emails to re-send:


NB: Only emails that can be sent based upon Off Site Agreement Status will be shown
